explains: adj. 全神贯注的；入迷的

sentences.en: She listened to the speaker with rapt attention.
sentences.cn: 她全神贯注地听演讲者讲话。

sentences.en: I noticed that everyone was watching me with rapt attention.
sentences.cn: 我注意到大家都在专注地望着我。

sentences.en: Some sit rapt for ten hours straight.
sentences.cn: 有些粉丝们会全神贯注地持续坐上10个小时。
